pr_title: Use Latest PagedFlux Changes from Azure Core

timeline.message: Update PagedFlux usage to use new changes from Azure Core
Use custom PagedFlux implementation in Azure Search to support pages with additional metadata
Updated to use ContinuablePagedFlux via SearchPagedFlux implementation
Updated PagedFlux usage in Azure Search to allow search to use its non-String continuation token

timeline.bodyText: This class will be removed once this is merged into Azure Core, this was added into Search directly to unblock this change.
timeline.author: alzimmermsft

replies.bodyText: Do we have it for preview 1? Can u put it under impl?
replies.author: sima-zhu

replies.bodyText: The changes for this in Azure Core should be merged before preview 1 ships. This can't be under implementation as it is a super class to a public API and we don't want to have any classes in the hierarchy for a public API be non-public API.
replies.author: alzimmermsft

timeline.author: sima-zhu

replies.bodyText: Not sure how the indentation is wrong, I thought it was 4 spaces per level of indentation?
replies.author: alzimmermsft

timeline.bodyText: I did not understand why we still use  PagedFluxBase here. Do we want to deprecate it?
timeline.author: sima-zhu

replies.bodyText:
The deprecation of PagedFluxBase is still under discussion, I believe we are leaning towards not deprecating it as one of the most common scenarios for specialized PagedFluxs is what is covered by PagedFluxBase.
@JonathanGiles @anuchandy @srnagar
replies.author: alzimmermsft

replies.bodyText: That's right, since PagedFluxBase is still a common type for some services where continuation token is string and the response is a type of PagedResponse, we don't want to eagerly deprecate something that might be useful.
replies.author: srnagar

timeline.message: Add logic to handle when Azure Resource Group isn't set

timeline.author: srnagar

replies.bodyText: Shouldn't, null value is likely an error scenario.
replies.author: alzimmermsft

replies.bodyText: What does a HTTP 204 resolve to? Would this have a non-null value?
replies.author: srnagar

replies.bodyText: The autocomplete API only expects 200 as a valid response code.
replies.author: alzimmermsft

timeline.author: srnagar
